segments.text: Mr . Brown , are your children always kicking up a row like this ? I cannot concentrate on my paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , Mr . Black . I ’ m trying to make them quiet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid if the noise goes on , I shall have no alternative but to leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . Believe me , everything will be all right .
segments.speaker: S2
